feed.title: GitHub GDScript Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of GDScript in GitHub

entry.title: KoBeWi/Metroidvania-System
entry.summary: General-purpose framework for creating metroidvania games in Godot.

entry.title: rakugoteam/Rakugo-Dialogue-System
entry.summary: Inspired by Ren'Py, Rakugo is a project aiming to provide a way to make narrative-based games on Godot easily. Simplify your project, if it is a visual novel, point and click, RPG, interactive text game or many other styles and blends of styles.

entry.title: gdquest-demos/godot-4-3D-Characters
entry.summary: Beautiful 3D animated game characters for the Godot game engine, ready to drag and drop into your projects
